verses.verse: A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah. O God <WH430>, thou art my God <WH410>; earnestly will I seek <WH7836> thee <WH5315>: My soul thirsteth <WH6770> for thee <WH1320>, my flesh longeth <WH3642> for thee <WH6723>, In a dry and weary <WH5889> land <WH776>, where no <WH1097> water is <WH4325>.
So have I looked <WH2372> upon thee in the sanctuary <WH6944>, To see <WH7200> thy power <WH5797> and thy glory <WH3519>.
Because thy lovingkindness <WH2617> is better <WH2896> than life <WH2416>, My lips <WH8193> shall praise thee <WH7623>.
So will I bless <WH1288> thee while I live <WH2416>: I will lift up <WH5375> my hands <WH3709> in thy name <WH8034>.
My soul <WH5315> shall be satisfied <WH7646> as with marrow <WH2459> and fatness <WH1880>; And my mouth <WH6310> shall praise <WH1984> thee with joyful <WH7445> lips <WH8193>;
When I remember <WH2142> thee upon my bed <WH3326>, And meditate <WH1897> on thee in the night-watches <WH821>.
For thou hast been my help <WH5833>, And in the shadow <WH6738> of thy wings <WH3671> will I rejoice <WH7442>.
My soul <WH5315> followeth hard <WH1692> after <WH310> thee <WH3225>: Thy right hand upholdeth me <WH8551>.
But those that seek <WH1245> my soul <WH5315>, to destroy <WH7722> it <WH935>, Shall go into the lower parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>.
They shall be given over <WH5064> to the power of the sword <WH3027>: They shall be a portion <WH4521> for foxes <WH7776>.

But the king <WH4428> shall rejoice <WH8055> in God <WH430>: Every one that sweareth <WH7650> by him shall glory <WH1984>; For the mouth <WH6310> of them that speak <WH1696> lies <WH8267> shall be stopped <WH5534>.
